message.body: are you having an interesting day?
for a tuesday...yeah I would say so
what about for a friday?
lol....what's going on?
well the trip to mt. washington is postponed at best
oh giant bummer
really sorry to hear that
It may still happen, but it won't be til sept at the earliest. My faith in it happening has kind of dissapated though
what caused it be postponed/cancelled?
my buddie's baby-mama
she just said "no"
apparently she had a commitment that weekend
ahh
it's bullshit, that's how it always goes
she's got him by the balls, he's just too nice about it all
how do you really feel? ;-)
yeaaa sorry to hear that.
It's just that Dan is about the nicest person you could ever meet
One of the few I can count on no matter what
So I hate to see him abused in any way
abused? does he not enjoy being whipped?
maybe it's love
they are not together, and haven't been in 6 years
sorry i'm a moron; i left the page
happens. I said that they are not together and haven't been in 6 years
she cheated on him, then found out she was preg. didnt know who the father was
so got back with her?
nope
after the 9 mo wait, paternity test came back and it was his. She wanted him back, he said fuck no
good man
but you guys can't go b/c he has to watch the kid?
or was she gonna go with?
I dont think you get it. Shes not in the picture. She is only involved because they have joint custody of their son.
that and she robs Dan for $400 a week
right, but you said she's the reason you can't go to mt. wash...so I'm trying to figure out why the hell not if she's not involved.
child support is robbing?? I don't wanna fry that fish right now
cuz in order for dan to be able to go, she would have to keep Noah all weekend, which isn't they normal setup
you can raise a kid on much less than $400/wk
there we go...got it
she has taken him to court on a few occassions to get more money out of him
ok, so what's are you gonna do if you are not feeling confident about the trip working out?
I haven't decided
geez,..this place is chaos sometimes. bossman just set off the alarm on the car so I had to go pull the battery to get it to stop beeping
you're pretty fired up right now, huh?
nah, Im actually kinda chill right now
It may not be coming through in chat
you're coming across as quite bothered, the way I'm reading.
that is mainly due to the plans that got broken earlier this morning
the car alarm thing is more amusing than anything. I just wonder how long he would have left it go if I hadn't pulled the battery
ahh, anyway....How you feeling?
umm, a bit underwater but suprisingly calm about it.

Didn't finish a report in time for work this morning....Workin on a paper right now that's due this evening, but I have to leave for a seminar in the city in 30 minutes, then go right back to work til 9 or so.
been busy busy.
calm enough to take the time to chat w/ me. I appreciate it
lol...yeaaa
you had me curious
I really should be getting back to work...I have to leave early today
How's that?
ok, works for me. Hope things turn around for ya.
abububuh, you're not gettin out of it that easy!
curious about your "boo hoo" status this morning
oooh, right. well I'm glad to have cleared that up for ya
'till next time, m'dear
